code: import React,{useMemo}from'react';import{Card,CardBody,CommunityIcon,Flex,Heading,Text}from'@pancakeswap/uikit';import shuffle from'lodash/shuffle';import{useTeams}from'state/teams/hooks';import{useTranslation}from'contexts/Localization';import SelectionCard from'../components/SelectionCard';import NextStepButton from'../components/NextStepButton';import useProfileCreation from'./contexts/hook';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Team=()=>{const{teamId:currentTeamId,actions}=useProfileCreation();const{t}=useTranslation();const{teams}=useTeams();const handleTeamSelection=value=>actions.setTeamId(parseInt(value,10));const teamValues=useMemo(()=>shuffle(Object.values(teams)),[teams]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{fontSize:"20px",color:"textSubtle",bold:true,children:t('Step %num%',{num:3})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Heading,{as:"h3",scale:"xl",mb:"24px",children:t('Join a Team')}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{as:"p",mb:"24px",children:t('It won’t be possible to undo the choice you make for the foreseeable future!')}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{mb:"24px",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CardBody,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Heading,{as:"h4",scale:"lg",mb:"8px",children:t('Join a Team')}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{as:"p",color:"textSubtle",mb:"24px",children:t('There’s currently no big difference between teams, and no benefit of joining one team over another for now. So pick whichever one you like!')}),teamValues&&teamValues.map(team=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(SelectionCard,{name:"teams-selection",value:team.id,isChecked:currentTeamId===team.id,image:"/images/teams/".concat(team.images.md),onChange:handleTeamSelection,disabled:!team.isJoinable,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{bold:true,children:team.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Flex,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CommunityIcon,{mr:"8px"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{children:team.users.toLocaleString()})]})]},team.name);})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NextStepButton,{onClick:actions.nextStep,disabled:currentTeamId===null,children:t('Next Step')})]});};export default Team;
